# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPricePoints | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPricePoints ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppricepoints)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPricePoints 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPricePoints

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppricepoints#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPricePoints
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppricepoints#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppricepoints#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppricepoints#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppAppPricePointsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appapppricepointslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppricepoints#see-also)

### [Getting an appâ€™s price points](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppricepoints#Getting-an-apps-price-points)

[`List all price points for an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-apppricepoints)Get all the available price points for a specific app.[`Read app price point information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v3-apppricepoints-_id_)Get details about a specific app price point.[`List app price point equalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v3-apppricepoints-_id_-equalizations)List all equivalent app prices points to a base price point.[`GET /v3/appPricePoints/{id}/relationships/equalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v3-apppricepoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations)
